name: INTERSHELTER
description: Intershelter is a new post apocalyptic battle royal game. You have 30 minutes to get to the nearest of InterShelter bunkers which were created in fear of nuclear war. The situation is somewhat complicated by the fact that very few shelters exist and one rescue capsule has fifty applicants.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, 8.1, 10 (64 bit only) Processor: 2 ghz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: nVidia GeForce GTX660 series or higher DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 4 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 64bit Processor: 3 ghz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 980 DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 8 GB available space
